content.en: Efficient 3D SAR Imaging: Researchers have developed various algorithms to improve the efficiency and accuracy of 3D imaging in synthetic aperture radar (SAR) systems. These algorithms utilize advanced techniques such as 2D and 3D range migration, sparsely sampled aperture data, NUFFT technology, and FFT-based reconstruction. By applying these algorithms, researchers have achieved high-resolution imaging, reduced computational load, improved imaging quality, and real-time operation in SAR systems. These advancements have the potential to enhance applications such as mmWave imaging, near-field imaging, and MIMO-SAR imaging.
content.da: Effektiv 3D SAR-billeddannelse: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af 3D-billeddannelse i syntetisk apertur radar (SAR) systemer. Disse algoritmer anvender avancerede teknikker som 2D og 3D range migration, sparsomt samplede aperturdata, NUFFT-teknologi og FFT-baseret rekonstruktion. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer har forskerne opnået højopløsningsbilleddannelse, reduceret beregningsbelastning, forbedret billedkvalitet og realtidsdrift i SAR-systemer. Disse fremskridt har potentiale til at forbedre anvendelser som mmWave-billeddannelse, nærfeltsbilleddannelse og MIMO-SAR-billeddannelse.
